name: PHP Value Objects
tagline: A resources site for using Value Objects in PHP
body:
# Welcome to PHP Value Objects

ValueObjects are an essential concept when implementing Domain Driven Design, but they can be used in any OO project. @kacper's [recent blog post](http://kacper.gunia.me/blog/ddd-building-blocks-in-php-value-object) is a good introduction, and we'll link to more resources in the coming weeks.
